Content:
I buyed a Honda aviator bs3 in December 2023 I did everything in scooter like changing gear oil, brake oil and adding new battery to it then I did few repairs from mechanic about accelerator (throttle) problem he made but changes to accelerator

after few days it suddenly stops working while riding

It also doesn't stay idle after a short ride

So what's reason for it?
